formatted_address: B33, Pontoon B, ONE*15 Marina, Puteri Harbour, 79000 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Brooklyn Cruise

reviews.text: Captain Loco, thank you for the amazing journey.  Your team was so good in customer service as well. During the ride, we learnt a lot about the checkpoints and places as well. Due to the weather we couldn't see the sunset. But we really enjoyed this journey. Thank you!

The experience was good. We enjoy the ride. Capt Loco and Ambok were so accommodating.  Ambok was good in story telling. Though we can't really see the sunset due to the weather.. Overall, it was a pleasant journey.
Good experience. Amok was patient and kind to provide assistance with location and change of scheduled time. Captain Loco explained and shared their scenery. Appreciated much üëç

The views are superb. The whole process of booking and confirmation and boarding are speedy. Enjoy the breeze and the lights. 630-715pm timing will be nice with sunsets and some lights . Enjoy the weather and enjoy the experience.

We had an amazing experience with Ambok and Capt Loco! The boat ride was so calming with plenty of scenic views, and our photo taker did a fantastic job capturing every memorable moment. Even though we went out at night, they were very accommodating and made sure we felt comfortable and safe throughout the trip. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a fun and hassle-free boat adventure! If youre looking for a worth it and within the budget date, this is good!

vicinity: B33, Pontoon B, ONE*15 Marina, Puteri Harbour, Johor Bahru
